IRS990.MissionDesc: ELIMINATING POVERTY BY PROVIDING THE OPPORTUNITY FOR OUR LOW AND MODERATE INCOME NEIGHBORS, FAMILIES, AND FRIENDS IN THE GREATER HAMPDEN COUNTY AREA TO ACHIEVE GREATER INDEPENDENCE AND A HIGHER QUALITY OF LIFE.
IRS990.Desc: VOC BROKERS THE FUEL ASSISTANCE FUNDS TO ELIGIBLE FAMILIES IN ALLOF HAMPDEN COUNTY EXCLUDING SPRINGFIELD.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: VOC OPERATES SIX CHILD CARE CENTERS IN HOLYOKE AND CHICOPEE. OURGOAL IS TO ASSIST PARENTS WHO ARE WORKING, IN TRAINING LEADING TOEMPLOYMENT, OR HAVE OTHER SPECIAL NEEDS. WE PROVIDE A COMPLETEEDUCATION PROGRAM, MEALS, AND OPPORTUNITIES FOR PARENTINVOLVEMENT.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: VOC'S WOMEN, INFANTS, AND CHILDREN (WIC) PROGRAM PROVIDESINFORMATION AND VOUCHERS FOR FREE HEALTHY FOODS TO ELIGIBLEFAMILIES. WHEN APPROPRIATE, WIC ASSISTS PARTICIPANTS TO MAKENUTRITION CHANGES IN A MANNER THAT WILL RESULT IN IMPROVED HEALTHFOR THE ENTIRE FAMILY.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: VOC IS A COMMUNITY ACTION ORGANIZATION PROVIDING PROGRAMS FOR THE ELDERLY AND CHILDREN INCLUDING HEALTH AND EDUCATION.

ProgramServiceRevenueGrp.Desc: FEES AND CONTRACTS FROM GOV. AGEN

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: 2013 - MISCELLANEOUS INCOME $44,243 2014 - MISCELLANEOUS INCOME $45,705 2015 - MISCELLANEOUS INCOME $44,640 2016 - DEVELOPER FEE $263,632 2016 - FORGIVENESS OF DEBT $18,000 2016 - MISCELLANEOUS INCOME $22,514 2017 - PROPERTY MANAGEMENT $350,367 2017 - ADVERTISING $21,600 2017 - FORGIVENESS OF DEBT $18,000 2017 - SUBSIDIES PRIVATE CLIENT FEES AND OTHER INCOME $280,142

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PROCESS TO REVIEW FORM 990 THE FORM 990 IS PRESENTED TO THE FINANCE COMMITTEE FOR REVIEW AND RECOMMENDATION TO THE FULL BOARD OF DIRECTORS FOR APPROVAL PRIOR TO THE FORM 990 BEING FILED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PROCESS FOR MONITORING COMPLIANCE WITH CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS DISTRIBUTED ANNUALLY TO KEY EMPLOYEES AND BOARD MEMBERS TO READ AND SIGN OFF ON THE POLICY. OFFICERS AND DIRECTORS ABSTAIN FROM VOTING ON ITEMS THAT MAY BE INTERPRETED AS A CONFLICT OF INTEREST. DISCLOSURE IS MADE IN THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS OF ANY RELATED PARTY TRANSACTIONS. THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR MONITORS AND ENFORCES COMPLIANCE WITH THE POLICY ON AN ON-GOING BASIS THROUGH OUT THE YEAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PROCESS FOR DETERMINING COMPENSATION OF EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AN ANNUAL PERFORMANCE EVALUATION IS PERFORMED BY THE PERSONNEL COMMITTEE AND THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. HUMAN RESOURCES PERFORMS A SALARY SURVEY OF SIMILAR EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR SALARIES IN THE AREA. THE COMMITTEES THEN RECOMMEND A SALARY, WHICH IS APPROVED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DISCLOSURE OF GOVERNING DOCUMENTS THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON WRITTEN REQUEST OF THE INTERESTED PARTY. THE UNIFORM FINANCIAL REPORT IS ALSO MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC ON THE OPERATIONAL SERVICES DIVISION'S (OSD) WEBSITE.
